sld1.text: At VidaSana, we are committed to improving your work wellness with comprehensive and personalized solutions.

sld2.text: Discover our activities and workshops designed to promote a healthy and balanced lifestyle in the workplace.

sld3.text: Participate in our wellness activities and sports events to improve your physical and mental health while having fun.

mision.title: Our Mission
mision.text: To motivate Peruvians who feed the world to live a healthier life every day, all the time. We achieve this by combining the power of hardware and software, offering a digital tool that:

list.op1: Monitors your key health and nutrition indicators.
list.op2: Creates motivational spaces through wellness activities.
list.op4: Fosters a support community among users.

vision.title: Our Vission
vision.text: "To be the connection that helps Peruvian collaborators improve their physical, mental, and emotional well-being in 2023"

list.op1: Men and women, between 25 and 55 years old, residents of Peru, from socio-economic levels A, B, C, and D.
list.op2: Collaborators from agro-industrial companies or related fields, with full-time jobs, interested in improving their health and familiar with technology.
list.op3: People seeking a balance between their work and personal life.
list.op4: Individuals who value and seek wellness and health programs in their workplaces.

list.op1: Medium and large companies operating in Peru, from agro-industrial or related sectors, with a Human Resources department.
list.op2: Companies interested in increasing employee productivity and satisfaction through wellness programs.
list.op3: Companies seeking to reduce costs related to occupational health, such as absenteeism and occupational diseases.
list.op4: Organizations committed to corporate social responsibility and the well-being of their employees.

list.op1: Improve your physical, mental, and emotional health with our personalized programs.
list.op2: Participate in activities that encourage healthy habits.
list.op3: Receive recommendations based on your health indicators.
list.op4: Connect with other professionals interested in wellness.

list.op1: Improve your employees' health and reduce absenteeism.
list.op2: Decrease expenses related to health issues.
list.op3: Enhance your corporate image with genuine commitment.
list.op4: Promote a more harmonious and satisfying work environment.
